description: Provides environmental information about the conditions at the location.

windDirectionCompass.description: Wind direction in compass points at the time of activity.

windDirectionDegrees.description: Wind direction in decimal degrees at the time of activity.

airTemperature.description: Air temperature at the time of activity.

humidity.description: Humidity at the time of activity.

soilTemperature.description: Soil temperature at or near the time of activity.

solarRadiation24hr.description: Cumulative solar radiation over 24 hour period (units B13 - J/m2).
